com.link_intersystems.math

Interface Sum<N extends Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - the precision of the sum.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Aggregate<N>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigDecimalSum

    public interface Sum<N extends Number>
extends Aggregate<N>
    This interface represents the sum of a certain amount of values.
    Since:
    1.2.0;
    Author:
    Ren√© Link [rene.link@link- intersystems.com]

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addValue(Number value)
      Add another value to this Sum.
      N getValue()
      The sum of all values that have been added to this Sum.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        N getValue()
        The sum of all values that have been added to this Sum.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface Aggregate<N extends Number>
        Returns:
        the sum of all values that have been added, or 0 if no value has been added yet.
        Since:
        1.2.0;

      • addValue

        boolean addValue(Number value)
        Add another value to this Sum.
        Specified by:
        addValue in interface Aggregate<N extends Number>
        Parameters:
        value - the value to add.
        Returns:
        true if the Aggregate.addValue(Number) operation changed the value of this Aggregate.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if value is null.
        Since:
        1.2.0;
